title: In The Company Of Bridget
description: Bridget LaMontaigne wants to live life to its fullest. She takes on the modeling world and her new high-profile life soon opens the door to a world she never knew existed. A chance of a lifetime presents her with the opportunity to be in control of her own company and experience success and love in ways she had only dreamed about. Her new mentor, a man of international fame and prestige, seems ready to put all of his influence behind Bridget to help her get to the top, while her old love, someone she thought that she could always count on, makes her life difficult in ways in which she could have never imagined. Then, an “accidental” meeting brings the man of her dreams to her doorstep. Burned once, can she trust the new man in her life enough to share in her success and her future?In The Company Of Bridget is a story of love, lust, jealousy, the quest for money and the power it brings.
author: B. Buena
